about.name: Terry Lee
about.title: Junior Programmer (Software Developer) @ Hong Kong Hospital Authority
about.bio: Hey there, I’m Terry. I’m a Computer Science grad from the University of Surrey, now a Junior Programmer at the Hong Kong Hospital Authority...

details: Developed and maintained ERP system for Hospital Authority
Assisted and supported staff requests from different departments
Ensured smooth functioning of web pages and features
Guided users through migrations from SharePoint to new system
Collaborated with team members on system improvements
Utilized ASP, HTML, JS for development tasks
Guided and introduced courses to visitors

projects.title: DocGPT (ReadmeGPT)
details: Python-based CLI application using OpenAI API.
Automatically generates README.md files for undocumented GitHub repositories.
Scans repositories to create comprehensive documentation for developers.

projects.title: Adaptive Route Planner (Final Year Project)
details: Developed an adaptive route planner web application.
Real-time route planning based on user preferences.
Built with Python and Flask, integrating OpenStreetMap and Nominatim APIs.
Frontend designed with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

fun_fact: I'm a big FPS fan, with over 4,000 hours spent on Overwatch, Apex Legends, and Rainbow Six Siege combined! I also love cats and dogs if you can't tell.
